text: * Kansei, a Japanese era name * Kansei, a visual novel video game by Sakevisual from 2011 * Kansei calendar, a Japanese lunisolar calendar * Kansei engineering, a method for translating feelings and impressions into product parameters * Kansei Edict, a document that banned any teaching or propagation of heterodox studies * Kansei Nakano, a Japanese politician * Kansei Reforms, a series of Japanese reactionary policy changes * Calsonic Kansei, Japanese automotive company
title: Kansei (disambiguation)
